post:
Hostabulous, No Gimmicks Webhosting! | Proudly Canadian
We have been in business since 2001 under the fusionX brand, targeting local business customers (Canada, Québec).
We rebranded to Hostabulous in late 2013 to provide the same service, reliability and agressive pricing to a world wide audience.

Hostabulous cares alot about your security and privacy, all our plans are packed with tons of FREE features!

We really don't cut corners and spare no expense when it comes to web hosting.

Facts
█ We are not resellers, we maintain and admin our own physical servers (no VPS).
█ Our servers administrators are in the web hosting industry for more than a decade.
█ We keep our servers as fast as possible and not oversold for maximum stability & security.
█ Servers are always up to date, and monitored 24/7 for any hardware or network issues.
█ Unlike some competitors, that pretend 24/7 support but are unable to resolve your issues quickly, our support staff works from 8:30am to midnight (EST) 7 days a week, and will resolve any issues you may have.

If you have any questions please submit a support ticket.


==========
cPanel PLANS
==========

Linux Features:

█ LiteSpeed Web Servers (HTTP/2 & SPDY enabled!) w/ LSCache and LiteMage(Magento Super Cache))
█ CloudLinux with CageFS
█ RAID10 array using latest Intel SSDs
█ Cloudflare CDN with Railgun (yes we are an optimized partner!)
█ SNI support for Web and Mail, no need to buy a dedicated IP for SSL security
█ Free SSL for all your sites with LetsEncrypt
█ Daily Remote Backups with Idera R1Soft (30 days retention) - Restore files and databases yourself!
█ Proactive security and servers monitoring
█ Web Application Firewall (WAF) - Helps against injections & hacking
█ Optimized MailScanner Anti-Spam - Get a spam free Inbox
█ Latest cPanel / WHM 11.60.x
█ MariaDB 10.1 on SSDs for lightning fast websites
█ PHP Selector (5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 7.0) to get all your apps working
█ Softaculous Enterprise scripts auto installer - select over 400 scripts/apps
█ 4 Locations, Canada (Montréal), USA East (Asheville) & West (Los Angeles), Germany (Frankfurt)
█ Support in English and French.
█ and much more!
